price: 18. Oo ku dheh: Ma dooneysaa inaad iska daahiriso (shirkiga iyo macaasida)?
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
